title: Fourteenth century bronze octagonal chandelier
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Musée Arabe. Salle No. 1.  Lustre (tannour) en bronze fondu. Provenant de la mosquée du Sultan Hassan XIVe siècle. Translation of photographer's description: Arab museum. Hall No. 1 Cast bronze chandelier from the mosque of Sultan Hassan. Fourteenth century.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
license: Copyright 2012, American University in Cairo. All rights reserved.
